messages.subject: Re: cat that is in the freezer waiting for spring.
messages.msgSnippet: ... Skimming the digest and reading the above, my first thought was, Hey, I don t remember telling them that!   Then I noticed that  the departed cat in the
messages.messageBody:
> In a message dated 4/2/03 10:39:02 AM, zenmomma@... writes:
>
> << our dear
>>> departed cat that is in the freezer waiting for spring.>>

Skimming the digest and reading the above, my first thought was, "Hey, I
don't remember telling them that!" Then I noticed that the departed cat
in the freezer was from zenmomma.

Through the years, we've had several cats and one bunny in the freezer
waiting for spring..
Not this year, this year the freezer is waiting on me to defrost it!

Peace and Love from a Spiritual Unschooler...
Barda Allen

Helena, MT 59601
